items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfortable Fall Dress!
items.body: The MEROKEETY womenâ€™s fall long dress is elegant and perfect for cooler weather. The fabric feels soft and comfortable, and the design is flattering for many occasionsâ€”work, parties, or casual outings. It fits true to size and looks great with boots or heels. A versatile and stylish addition to any wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Michael

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and well made
items.body: I've been looking for a white dress for a long time and I love this dress! It's flattering, has a super cute pattern and is a perfect length. (I'm 5'2".) I bought one true to my size and it fits great! It's put together well and I think it'll be cute to pair with boots and a denim jacket or with bright colored dress sandals. Read more
items.author: Becky B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
items.body: Pretty, good quality, and fits true to size. It was perfect as holiday party teacher-ware. Comfortable and has pockets! Read more
items.author: Kristin Ehret

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars If only it didn't shrink!
items.body: Lovely dress, but came needing to be dewrinkled. Washed it as directed, very carefully, cold water, low heat, but still got significant shrinkage in length. So don't expect it to stay this long. Went from a slightly high waist to a true empire. Fit was true to size. Read more
items.author: Libbyg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality material
items.body: This is the best dress Iâ€™ve ever purchased from Amazon. Very nice quality, non-itchy, fabric, heavy enough to be a fall dress, good stretch in the waist band and is just so flattering overall. Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ 160lbs in a medium. Please appreciate my toddler photographer. ðŸ˜‚ Read more
items.author: Ronald C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice dress.. and comfy!
items.body: Color was vivid, weight of the dress was perfect for fall/ early winter, style and fabric of the dress was perfect for a wedding I attended but could also be dressed down a bit of preferred. I was very happy with my purchase and received many compliments. Read more
items.author: dianne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality modest dress
items.body: The material is good quality and has some weight to it, the dress itself is very beautiful in person and the cut of it looks so flattering on my body. The elastic cinched waist really gives you a nice hour glass effect. Read more
items.author: fera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite dress ever.
items.body: This fits very well. I am 5' tall and weigh 126, but am a size 32H. I was concerned it would be too tight in the chest, but it is smooth. So comfortable and feminine. Might buy a similar one from Merokeety. Read more
items.author: Bdh3

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Blue, Watermelon, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Green, Navy, Pink, White, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, Light Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
